question: Son will perform Hajj first or father/mother? Please explain in the light of Hadith?
answer:
QUESTION
I'm bachelor staying Saudi Arabia last three years and would like to perform hajj coming years and I'm not able to afford the expenses of visa transportation to bring my father/mother for Hajj. So my hajj would be acceptable without my father/mother as both gave me verbal permission.?
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible for you to perform haj before your parents perform haj.

Was salaam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
